value.title: DAX Fridays #189: Which function is faster to count rows: COUNT OR COUNTROWS?
value.excerpt: Which DAX function will count the rows of a table faster: COUNT or COUNTROWS?  Lets find out shall we? value.title: DAX fridays! #19: DIVIDE
value.excerpt: Let's go through DIVIDE() function available in DAX!  The DIVIDE function performs divisions and returns alternate result or BLANK() on division by 0.It is faster than the simple division operator.
